section.title: Fill_OptionWhat()
section.description: The Fill_OptionWhat() function returns the formatted code for a list box.
section.example: FUNCTION fill_optionwhat as C(currselections as C) 'first value is a table name 'second value is a display value what_list = <<%text% |< Select > customer|Customers product|Products invoice_header|Invoices %text% 'findwhat value is first value in currselections fill_optionwhat = a5_html_list_populate(what_list, word(currselections, 1, "|"), 3) END FUNCTION

section.title: Fill_OptionBy()
section.example: FUNCTION fill_optionby as C (currselections as C) 'get a list of character fields in 'findwhat' table by_list = "|< Select >" if word(currselections, 1, "|") <> "" ' a findwhat value is specified fld_list = table.external_field_name_get("PathAlias.ADB_Path\\" + word(currselections, 1, "|"), "n|t") for each foo in fld_list if word(foo, 2, "|") = "C" 'only list character fields by_list = by_list + crlf()+ word(foo, 1, "|") + "|" + w_upper(stritran(word(foo, 1, "|"), "_", " ")) end if next end if fill_optionby = a5_html_list_populate(by_list, word(currselections, 2, "|"), 3) END FUNCTION

section.title: Fill_OptionVal()
section.example: FUNCTION fill_optionval as C(currselections as C) 'get a list of unique values in field in 'findwhat' table val_list = "|< Select >" if word(currselections, 1, "|") <> "" ' a findwhat value is specified fld = word(currselections, 2, "|") if fld <> "" ' a findby value is specified val_list = val_list + crlf()+ table.external_record_content_get("PathAlias.ADB_Path\\"+ word(currselections, 1, "|"), "alltrim(" + fld + ")", fld, "alltrim(" + fld + ") <> \"\" .and. unique_key_value()") end if end if fill_optionval = a5_html_list_populate(val_list, word(currselections, 3, "|"), 3) END FUNCTION

section.title: Fill_OptionRec()
section.example: FUNCTION fill_optionrec as C(currselections as C) 'get a list of records in field in 'findwhat' table that have findval 'value' in 'findby' field rec_list = "|< Select >" table = word(currselections, 1, "|") fld = word(currselections, 2, "|") val = word(currselections, 3, "|") ' The next list is used to determine what to value to return and display to identify the record ' It has the format of 'table name|identifier field|content expression rec_disp_list =<<%text% customer * customer_id * alltrim(firstname) + " " + alltrim(lastname) product * product_id * desc invoice_header * Invoice_number * Invoice_number %text% if val <> "" ' a findval value is specified, find display ' populate an array to find values to return delete a_disp dim a_displine_count(rec_disp_list) as P a_disp.initialize_properties("table * id * content", rec_disp_list) content_idx = a_disp.find(lower(table), "lower(table)") if content_idx > 0 ' a content_expression was found ret_value = a_dispcontent_idx.content id = a_dispcontent_idx.id rec_list = rec_list + crlf()+ table.external_record_content_get("PathAlias.ADB_Path\\" + table, "alltrim(" + id + ") + \"|\" + alltrim(" + ret_value + ")", ret_value, "" + fld + "=\"" + val + "\"") end if end if fill_optionrec = a5_html_list_populate(rec_list, word(currselections, 4, "|"), 3) END FUNCTION

section.title: Fill_OptionField()
section.example: FUNCTION fill_optionfield as C(currselections as C) 'get a list of character fields in 'findwhat' table field_list = "|< Select >" table = word(currselections, 1, "|") rec = word(currselections, 4, "|") if table <> "" .and. rec <> "" fld_list = table.external_field_name_get("PathAlias.ADB_Path\\"+ table,"n|t") for each foo in fld_list if word(foo, 2, "|") = "C" 'only list character fields field_list = field_list + crlf()+ word(foo, 1, "|") + "|" + w_upper(stritran(word(foo, 1, "|"), "_", " ")) end if next end if fill_optionfield = a5_html_list_populate(field_list, word(currselections, 5, "|"), 3) END FUNCTION

section.title: Find_Value()
section.example: FUNCTION find_value as c(currselections as C) find_value = "" table = word(currselections,1,"|") rec = word(currselections,4,"|") fld = word(currselections,5,"|") if fld = "" .or. rec = "" exit function end if if fld = "" exit function end if ' This list is used to identify what identifier is used for a table rec_find_list =<<%text% customer|customer_id product|product_id invoice_header|Invoice_number %text% delete a_find dim a_findline_count(rec_find_list) as p a_find.initialize_properties("table|id", rec_find_list) content_idx = a_find.find(lower(table), "lower(table)") if content_idx > 0 ' a content_expression was found id = a_findcontent_idx.id find_value = table.external_record_content_get("PathAlias.ADB_Path\\" + table, fld, "", "" + id + "=\"" + rec + "\"") end if END FUNCTION
